Now you will see a list with all the codecs and qualities available for the selected video. 

Choose one item and you will be asked to download the video locally (on the phone) or to send the download via SSH to a linux machine. 

Destination linux-box requirements: Bash and Wget. Additional SSH info further on.

Here are just the preferences for "YouTube Downloader". 

The actual App can be accessed via the sharing button in the YouTube App, while watching a video. 

Then simply choose "YouTube Downloader" and you will have further usage info. 

You can also share any YouTube plain text link via any other App: i.e. your browser.
